_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc41:1.1.6^speaker: the female wanderer who received two pastries
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc41:1.1.10^speaker: the female wanderer who received two pastries
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc41:1.2.5^speaker: the Ājīvaka ascetic who received the lump
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc41:1.2.8^where_before_or_: the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc41^where: the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
